questions.text: What food does George get in the restaurant in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Pesto.

	George wonders why he buys the pasta because he knows he doesn't like it before he eats it.

questions.text: Where is Elaine's new boyfriend from?
questions.explanation:
Seattle.

	Elaine's new boyfriend, Ed, is her third boyfriend on the series.  He's staying with Elaine for a week.

questions.text: What is set on fire in the restaurant that George, Elaine and Jerry eat in?
questions.explanation:
menu.

	George notices that the menu is set on fire and he stomps the flame out.  The manager yells at the busboy and fires him for the mistake.

questions.text: Does the busboy live in an apartment?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	After realizing his phone was disconnected, Elaine hunts for the busboy's address so that George could apologize.

questions.text: Who goes with George to apologize to the busboy?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Kramer ends up doing nothing at the busboy's apartment, but Jerry recommends that someone go with George in case anything happens.

questions.text: What type of animal does the busboy have as a pet?
questions.explanation:
Cat.

	When Kramer enters the apartment, he forgets to close the door, so the busboy's cat Pequita runs out.

questions.text: What is broken in the busboy's living room?
questions.explanation:
A lamp.

	Kramer knocks the lamp onto the floor and breaks it.  He attempts to put it back together, but it falls apart.

questions.text: What coloured sweater does Elaine's boyfriend Ed have?
questions.explanation:
Brown.

	When Elaine wakes her boyfriend up at 9:15, they have forty-five minutes to reach his flight. Elaine can't find his shirt, so she packs one of hers.

questions.text: Does Elaine's boyfriend Ed make his flight home?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Elaine rushes to the airport, but she misses the flight after a five-car pile-up blocks the highway.

Antonio.

	Antonio's cat returns, he gets a new job, and George saves his life, but he ends up in a body cast after he fights with Elaine's boyfriend.
